text: Kinnaram Cholli Cholli is a 2001 Indian Malayalam film, directed by V. Murali and produced by T. Srinivasan and A. R. M. Mohan. The film stars Sindhu, David Das, Geetha and Meenu Kumar in lead roles. The film had musical score by S. P. Venkatesh. ==Cast== *Sindhu *David Das *Geetha *Meenu Kumar *Shakeela *Stephen kamal ==References== ==External links== * Category:2001 films Category:Indian films Category:2000s Malayalam-language films
title: Kinnaram Cholli Cholli
